name: destygo-chat-load-test
description: Main load test for Destygo Chat: 1 virtual user = 1 session = 1 conversation = 1 message (simultaneous send)

scripts.test:custom: echo 'Usage: DESTYGO_NUMBER_OF_USERS=XX DESTYGO_TEST_URL=URL DESTYGO_TEST_MESSAGE=MSG node send-messages-test.js'
scripts.test:connection:custom: echo 'Usage: DESTYGO_NUMBER_OF_USERS=XX DESTYGO_TEST_URL=URL DESTYGO_TEST_DURATION=SECONDS node connection-load-test.js'
scripts.docker:run: docker run --rm -e DESTYGO_TEST_URL -e DESTYGO_NUMBER_OF_USERS -e DESTYGO_TEST_DURATION -e DESTYGO_TEST_MESSAGE destygo-load-test
scripts.docker:quick: npm run docker:build && docker run --rm -e DESTYGO_TEST_URL destygo-load-test npm run test:quick
scripts.docker:connection:quick: npm run docker:build && docker run --rm -e DESTYGO_TEST_URL destygo-load-test npm run test:connection:quick
scripts.docker:custom: npm run docker:build && docker run --rm -e DESTYGO_TEST_URL -e DESTYGO_NUMBER_OF_USERS -e DESTYGO_TEST_DURATION -e DESTYGO_TEST_MESSAGE -e DESTYGO_NAVIGATION_TIMEOUT -e DESTYGO_CHAT_TIMEOUT destygo-load-test npm run test
scripts.docker:connection:custom: npm run docker:build && docker run --rm -e DESTYGO_TEST_URL -e DESTYGO_NUMBER_OF_USERS -e DESTYGO_TEST_DURATION -e DESTYGO_NAVIGATION_TIMEOUT -e DESTYGO_CHAT_TIMEOUT destygo-load-test npm run test:connection

author: Destygo Chat Engineering Team
